description.text:
[url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ][img]https://img.shields.io/badge/Discord-7289da?logo=discord&logoColor=fff&style=flat-square[/img][/url][url=https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=PSQ4D3HXNZKMG][img]https://custom-icon-badges.demolab.com/badge/-Donate-lightgrey?style=flat-square&logo=paypal&color=007CB1[/img][/url]
Weakaura Pack for the Mythic + Affix Tormented


If you want to have timers and are not using OmiCC/Elvui select the group , go to display options and tick "show text" below text1.
If you want to have some sounds, use this addon: https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/sharedmedia_causese

Special thanks for the coding help to the Weakauras discord!

Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my [url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ]Discord[/url].
If you like my work and want to support me you can [url=https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=PSQ4D3HXNZKMG]donate[/url]
description.html: Weakaura Pack for the Mythic + Affix Tormented If you want to have timers and are not using OmiCC/Elvui select the group , go to display options and tick "show text" below text1. If you want to have some sounds, use this addon: https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/sharedmedia_causese Special thanks for the coding help to the Weakauras discord! Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my Discord. If you like my work and want to support me you can donate

comments.text: [taggeduser]@Isaran[/taggeduser] i do plan on addin git to the big group aswell but i wanna test it before i upload :D this is just for people that don't wanna use my big pack (and for beta testing xD)
Hey, thanks for the great pack! May I ask why you made a separate Group for your SL Dungeons Aura

changelog.text:
- reexport for newest changes of the big pack

Disclaimer:

This is the last update for this Weakaurapack if you want to always have the most updated version get https://wago.io/SL-Dungeons instead
